doc.previous: Although this operation is perfectly valid it is not always useful because itself is not necessarily on the manifold Therefore we define the covariant derivative to be the forced projection of the intrinsic derivative back onto the manifold
doc.after: Since any general multivector can be expressed as a sum of a projection and a rejection in this case
